title: Von Miller Injury Impact, Top Young Quarterbacks, and What to Expect From the 2020 Season | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin Clark is joined by the newest member of the The Ringer NFL Show feed, Warren Sharp, to discuss if the Denver Broncos can overcome star linebacker Von Miller’s injury (17:59). They then rank the top young quarterbacks (25:08), talk about what trends to expect in the 2020 season (34:40), and more. 

Hosts: Kevin Clark 
Guest: Warren Sharp
